experience.description:
1. Network Monitoring and Scanning System.
 Developed a network scanning and monitoring tool designed to efficiently manage and oversee a large-scale network comprising over 10,000 devices, including switches, cameras, routers, UPS units, and radio frequency equipment.
The tool is also capable of generating comprehensive reports for devices, including details on uptime, downtime, and log history.
The tool can also automatically create issues for down devices, manage issue assignments and resolutions, and generate detailed issue logs.
Targeted to be used by Network Engineers and IT staff.
Technologies used: javascript, nextjs, python, fastapi, sqlite, material UI.
2. Visitor Management System.
 Developed visitor management system for Delhi Secretariat from scratch.
System includes modules for guards, receptionists, administrators, and complaint officers.
Implemented QR code system for visitor entry logging.
Handles a weekly footfall of over 1000 visitors, ensuring smooth operations and heightened security measures.
Technologies used: Javascript, Reactjs, Nestjs, Postgresql, tailwindcss.

courses.title: 100xDevs, 0-100 Fullstack Web Development
courses.description:
Developing backend applications using Node.js, TypeScript, Hono.js, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.
Proficient in working with Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) tools like Prisma and TypeORM.
Deploying backend services to serverless functions.
Deploying frontend applications to AWS,vercel,firebase etc.
Building full-stack web applications using Next.js.
Implementing authentication mechanisms using JWTs, NextAuth,clerk, and cookies.
 Utilizing various bundlers, including Vite, Parcel etc.
Managing monorepos effectively with Turborepo.
Proficient in containerizing applications with Docker.

courses.title: NamasteDev,Frontend Web Development
courses.description:
Developing Frontend's  using Reactjs.
Introduction to foundational tools and frameworks in web development.
 Dived deep into essential package managers and module bundlers for React projects.
 Understood JSX, React components, and their compositions.
 Implemented React's core features, managing state, and working with UI data.
 Mastered working with React hooks and understanding their importance.
Mastered working with Reat Router for smooth navigation and routing.
Class based components and their lifecycles.
 Advance optimization techniques including Custom Hooks.
Implementing Redux toolkit for state management.
